Verses: 2 aandavare, En Saththaththaik Kelum; En Vinnappangalin Saththaththirku Umadhu Sevigal Gavaniththiruppadhaaga.
3 karththaave, Neer Akkiramangalaik Gavaniththiruppeeraanaal, Yaar Nilainirpaan, Aandavare.
5 karththarukkuk Kaaththirukkiren; En Aaththumaa Kaaththirukkiradhu; Avarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Nambiyirukkiren.
6 eppozhudhu Vidiyum Endru Vidiyarkaalaththukkuk Kaaththirukkira Jaamakkaararaippaarkkilum Adhigamaai En Aaththumaa Aandavarukkuk Kaaththirukkiradhu.
7 isravel Karththarai Nambiyiruppadhaaga; Karththaridaththil Kirubaiyum, Avaridaththil Thiralaana Meetpum Undu.
8 avar Isravelai Adhin Sagala Akkiramangalinindrum Meettukkolvaar.
